[待翻译] Controls the resolution of the game in fullscreen mode.
embeddium.options.use_quad_normals_for_l:
[待翻译] When enabled, Embeddium will apply shading to non-vanilla block faces based on the true direction they are facing, not their axis-aligned direction. This can improve lighting quality when the Forge experimental light pipeline is disabled (which is recommended for best performance).

It has no effect if the experimental light pipeline is enabled.
